moreBlocks.websites: https://oakleylawky.com/ (Lexington criminal defense attorney ) https://oakleylawky.com/blog/ (Read our criminal defense blog)

description:
From our law office in Lexington, Kentucky, the attorneys at Oakley & Oakley, LLC, provide unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout Fayette County and across our region who are dealing with complex, pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

• Assault charges
• Domestic violence
• Drug crimes
• DUI
• Federal crimes
• Juvenile crimes
• Sex crimes
• Theft crimes
• White collar crimes
• Other felonies and misdemeanors

Collectively, our lawyers have more than 15 years of total legal experience, and we have achieved remarkable success fighting for the rights and liberties of our clients while helping them achieve the favorable outcomes they seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible. Honored for our success, our attorneys have earned Top 100 Trial Lawyers rankings from The National Trial Lawyers along with consistent recognition as being among the top lawyers in our area.

This success is the direct result of our unwavering commitment to those we serve. We promise to work aggressively to help secure the most favorable results possible for your unique case, and we are available 24/7 to address your questions and concerns promptly as they arise. You can count on us to be right there beside you throughout all legal proceedings to help you through his difficult and uncertain time in your life.

To begin the process, you can contact Oakley & Oakley, LLC, to take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in an attempt at keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
